title: Backup & Restore
description: Safeguard your data with regular backups

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download a complete backup of all your data including documents, settings, and preferences. You can optionally encrypt your backup with a password for enhanced security.
export.passwordWarning: ⚠️ Remember this password! You'll need it to restore your backup.

import.title: Restore From Backup
import.description: Restore your data from a previously exported backup file. This will merge the backup data with your existing data, avoiding duplicates where possible.

info.title: Important Information
points: Backups contain sensitive data. Store them securely and never share them publicly.
Regular backups are recommended, especially before major changes.
Imported data will be merged with existing data to avoid duplicates.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.clearDescription: Permanently delete all your local data. This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have a backup before proceeding.

dialog.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete ALL your local data including:
dialog.confirmBackupReminder: Make sure you have exported a backup before proceeding.

errors.loginRequired: You must be logged in to export data
errors.passwordRequired: Please enter a password to encrypt your backup
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.invalidFileType: Please select a valid backup file (.json)
errors.importLoginRequired: You must be logged in to import data

success.dataCleared: All data has been cleared successfully

messages.encrypted: This backup is encrypted. Please enter the password.
